## Download data and unzip locally
```r
zipData <- './activity.zip'
if(!file.exists("./activity.zip")) {
   download.file(url='https://github.com/linearregression/RepData_PeerAssessment1/blob/master/activity.zip?raw=true', destfile=zipData, method='curl')
}
if(!file.exists("./activity.csv")) {
   unzip(zipfile=zipData, overwrite=TRUE)
}
```
